content.detailedDescription: I am unable to describe this event in great detail at this time.  all i can say is that this was the most wierd and spectacular thing i have ever seen.  i'm still trying to convince myself that it never happened. please contact me for further insight.
content.summary: I spotted two ufos while on an airplane from puerto rico to florida. they were hovering and seemed to be communicating with one another.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside smoking with my husband and i noticed the blue green light in the sky coming down as if it was a plane landing, then i notice it go upward in the same place it just came down, then it moved sideways and down, in a circular motion. my husband is a skeptic and i asked him what that was since he has an explanation for everything. he began watching the light move around in opposite directions and circular movements when it went below the tree line. we saw the object hovering around the treeline and then it disappeared where we could not see it anymore. i asked him if he thought it was a plane or a helicopter and he said no. the skeptic admits it was a ufo. i don't know  if the object landed or what happened after it went out of view, we observed it in the same area of the sky for about five minutes (the whole time i smoked a cigarette i saw it). as soon as i saw the object i knew it was not a plane, a plane at night has flashing lights and red/blue this was a blue green pretty solid but pulsated a bit but it was constantly visible (color).

note: i thought the light was green and my husband thought it was blue.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Blue green ufo changing multiple directions/hovering

content.detailedDescription: While observing various objects both in groups of up to three and singly, various objects flash, blink, emit light patterns of various complexities and respond directly when illuminated by a hand laser, by flashing in sequences and as patterned surfaces on the craft themselves. at one point a very large silver lighted object came in from the west towards mt. rainier. when the object was directly overhead and into the 1 0'clock position it suddenly just became two separate objects about the same size but not quite. each object flashed brilliantly, faded, flashed very bright and then the objects traveled in different directions. one going north east, the other south west like a huge y where they forked in the sky so to speak. it was a wonderful display.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: While observing multiple objects fly over singly and as groups west of mt rainier with flashes, blinks & "textured" lights a large object split into two object with different directions

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my car, heading west and i saw an aspirin/golf ball solid white orb fly over the trees straight ahead of me in the distance and head north. it was 9:30 at night and it was just a white solid ball moving over the trees. then suddenly to my right, i saw a giant, dark, black,  shape fly over my car and head north also. like it was either chasing the orb or flying with it. it was a dark, black, upside down "a" shaped object and i could look up into the middle of the "a" part and see the night sky. it was all about 5 seconds and then both objects were gone. both objects disappeared when i turned my head to the left to see where they were going to. i knew immediately i saw a ufo and i checked my car clock to see if there was any "missing time" but there was none. i wasn't really scared, i thought it was really cool. not sure what i saw but it was something i can't explain. i found it strange i saw two objects in the sky at the same time
content.summary: Driving in car and saw a golf ball like craft fly over trees then over car

content.detailedDescription: Ok,i had 2 have been around 9 or 10 n visiting my aunt n uncle in missouri and 1 nite i am now recently recalling i woke n went outside. no remembery after thatbut the next day i was sick, throwing up what looked like orange juice, i was fine the day b4. i 4got about these events up untill the past few years. now i can remember standing in a field with a misty fog all around n thinking it was weird cause there was always cows around. year went by nand i would have feelings and dreams that would happen often. the most feeling is when i saw "fire in the sky" it reminded me of 1 feeling i have till this day. its when the guy is on the table n a mist comes down and then a layer of some kinda membrane came down and covers him. you feel powerless. and i can remember this feeling if i concentrate hard enough, which i dont do 2 often. a few yearsa went by and i started remembering being around when all this happen in dreams or just remembering what had happened. 1 nite i woke in my own house n being scared n getting up n going 2 my parents room n climbing inbetween then n going back 2 sleep, then waking uo between them n being very scared. i started moving around alot when a i heard voice in my head say please stay calm n nobody will b hurt, istarted banging my fists on the bed 2 try n wake my parents but got no response from them, they had their backs 2 me, n i rembering thinking they should wake up with me hitting the bed like i was but they didnt, then i realized that my fists were hurting cause it wasnt a mattress i was hitting, it was hard, n once i started hitting harder i heard again a voice in my head that if i didnt calm down my parents would die. this is so far the worst of my memories. the feelings n memories still remain. the only other memory i can recalect is when i was in my 20's n me n a friend were leaving my parents house n walking across the street when i remember looking up n seeing a craft in the sky, it was square n boxy like, if u can understand that,after that i don remember much but these memories r still here n have gotten worse in the past few years, i now drink alot 2 try n not think about these events but they're always there. so far i've been ok with them but i'm feeling the need 2 know 4 sure that im not crazy!!!!!! please contact me soon, 1-732-207-8600, thats my cell#
content.summary: No visual but lots of memories n they're getting more n more intense

content.detailedDescription:
I've seen a lot of movements in the sky lately. in aalborg, denmark.
this one was the most affective. the most memorable out of all the sightings i've experienced.
that is why this is my very first report also. previously i've just seen flying orbs and huge stationary flashes in the sky. like signaling that they are out there.

1) i was sitting in front of my apartment building waiting for some ufo sighting or movement.
2) it moved with constant speed and then went slowly really, really bright.
3) i knew instantly that this must be ufo (i've been waiting for this kind of sighting)
4) it's size was at first like normal (like average star) and its brightness the same. it moved with constant speed and during its flight it started to get bigger and brighter. its brightness can be compared to full moon in a clear night sky. it was white. then it went slowly back to its previous size. it didn't change or lose its direction or path.
5) i was by myself "wow", "cool" and literally giggling. totally amazed because this was what i've wanted to witness for a long, long time.
6) it appeared out of nowhere. had its flight. went back to its previous size and disappeared.
content.summary: Moved as a starlike dot from south to north. during straight line flight it went really bright round light. then went back to small dot as it was.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my yard at approximately 10pm with my family enjoying the beautiful weather when a large lighted object caught my eye. i was facing west and this thing was coming from the south heading north. my son, daughter, neighbor and husband saw it and we were able to take pics and video. the object was so slow and low made no noise and lasted long enough thay we all had enough time to get our phones on it...It definitely moved in a very controlled manner. it was in our view for approximately 1 minute!!! it seemed to be slowly ascending then speeded up and then it was gone as if it was never there.
content.summary: Bright saucer like object!!!

content.detailedDescription: Hello, i sent you this photo, that i took with my camara, i think those are ufo spheres, can you please check it, it its no a hoax, i think this picture is interesting and please use your technology to confirm.
content.summary: Ufo spheres

content.detailedDescription: While standing in the parking lot after work in st. catharines, ontario, canada, facing south east, talking to my cousin when out of the corner of my eye i saw this black orb/blob heading towards us. my cousin and i were watching this thing heading our way around 5:30 pm-ish. at first we thought it was a garbage bag filled with air, tied off and being blow by the wind except there was no wind, it was too big to be a garbage bag, and it was more of a sphere but it was undulating or shimmering and 10 -15 feet across. it looked like a water balloon being hit and filmed in slow motion. i didn't think to take out my blackberry until it stopped a went from heading south to north to heading due east and quickly disappeared, i was unable to take a video.  my cousin shrugged it off and barely remembers that day.  i would have to say that it was maybe 75 feet in the air and moving in a straight line. i was kind of flipping out on the inside and couldn't wait to get home to start youtubing black orbs but couldn't find much back then.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Noticed a black dot heading north slow, growing larger, black blob like, came to a stop then headed east quickly. no wind noticed.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of my property and for some reason i was compeled to take some pictures of the sun? don,t ask me why, i just did, please see the photos it made no noise and was not visable from the naked eye i would really like your opinion on what this thing is please call or e mail thanks joe
content.summary: Is from the photos only you tell me what it is?

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home.
i have noticed this object for years. it looks like a hole in the sky.
i thought it is a portal to space or something else.
it always appears as a clear area in the sky. it never moves but clouds disapear inside it. sometimes it looks as if it is an invisible object with exhaust.
it gives me feelings of something being there but i can't see it.
some days it can't be seen but partly cloudy days it is very promanate.
content.summary: Portal

content.detailedDescription: May 5th 2013 my wife and i stepped outside for a smoke as we where sitting there smoking and look at the night sky i noticed two objects which at first look i thought where stars but it seemed odd i've never noticed then before and they was really close to each other . as we watched the objects we noticed the began to move in a straigh line one behind the other both putting off a bright green glow as they move to the north from the south as the objects. where almost directly above us they stopped in midflight and began to omit a pinkish red glow for what seemed to be a matter of one minuet by this time my wife is scared pulling me by the arm to come inside as we both still had are eyes locked on the two tear shaped objects after watching for a little while longer the objects went back to green and shot straight up and where out of side with in a flash
content.summary: 5th of may 2013 my wife and i stepped out of are house for a smoke when we noticed two objects moving in a straight line headed north the objects put off a green light while in flight but when stationary the objects omitted a bright pinkish red glow

content.detailedDescription: I was at the drive thru at a fast food place and i looked out the window at and saw this blinking light.At first i thought it was a plane cause it was just blinking. then it started blinking really fast 3 blinks at a time really bright.And about a min later this small orange ball of light just appeared right behind this blinking light. this blinking light kept going on a straight path but the orange ball was stationary the whole time the object was visible. then the blinking light just blinked out and i couldnt see it anymore but the orange ball was still there for 5 min . right before it disappeared it blinked one time and it was gone! i have no idea what this thing was! this is the second sighting in san antonio tx that iv seen . san antonio tx has the most bases in all of the united states. "lackland air force base" "u.S. air force base" "us kelly air force base" "randolph air force base" "brooks air force base" "kennedy air force base" and others
content.summary: It was very odd and it was dark out

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking east to my parents house with my dog. from 12 oak post pl to 15 gatehouse pde (see google maps) i was on broad oak drv just about at the corner in front of the park. i was actually kind of already looking up because the sky was clear and the stars looked great. i was then startled when this light orb object appeared right above my head and moved fast directly east.

it kind of twirled a little like a bird would or changed direction ever so slightly, coming down and then to the right and then back on course again. this thing was going as fast as ive ever seen anything go and in reality i only saw it for maybe 2-3 seconds before it vanished.

i thought it was maybe something someone threw or a bird or something but no on was outside with me, it was late and i have never seen anything go this fast.

the object was pretty close to me actually but i cant say how far for sure. it made no noise that i can remember or recall.

i also thought it may have been a meteor or shooting star because i know we passed through some of haleys comet's rocks yesterday but ive seen a few shooting stars in my time and this was not the same and ive also seen a meteor enter our atmosphere and it was very loud and very obviously a meteorite with lots of smoke, ash and colors.

about 3 minutes later as i neared my parents house, my eye glued to the sky i saw a plane coming my way from the east so i sat and watched it. 

in a way i think i was comparing the two. this thing was about 100x faster than the plane.

i had not been drinking at the time nor had i smoked anything or taken any drugs.
content.summary: Ufo object flew over my head at almost light speed

content.detailedDescription: I took my dog out back for the night and as i was coming back inside i notice a bright light in the southeast. as i got to the porch i called my wife to come see. at that time it was overhead going northwest. all i could tell was it had no tail and made no sound. it was like a red ball on fire with the center bright red the outer ring was a lighter orange/red. i do wear glasses but they had nothing to do with my sight. i did ask myself who i should call. and tonight i found  your web page. it was in sight for about 3 min. i had no reaction or feelings all i know is what i saw.
content.summary: Bright light comming from the southeast and going northwest lasted for about 3 mins.

content.detailedDescription: I was out walking around in the back field of the club i belong to, i seen a very high flying jets leaving a contrails i would say about 40 -50 thousand feed, i seen this object fly by. i would say it was about 3 to 5 thousand feet above me.  it traveled about the same speed as a small single airplane. it was cegar shaped. i did not see any wings and did not hear any engine noise.   it was a clear bright day with light breeze.  teh object was a dark matelic. it had a dard metal color to it. it traveled in a straight line into i lost it in the trees.  there just wasn't any sound like you would hear froma airplane.  if i wasn't looking up at the time i would have never seen it. it was i say about the same length as a a300 airbus, it was like a rocket without tail fins, cone shaped.   my first reaction to it was i don't see wings.  what went through my mind was how can it fly without wings.  i know i keep talking about wings not being there and might sound funny  but i've very skeptical about ufo's in the first place but this is what i seen.
content.summary: After extreem high jet fly over seen object fly oppsite direction about 4000 ft. no noise or no wings could be seen speed about 180 - 250

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the back yard resting on a hamoc smoking a cigar watching for satellites flying by .
i noticed a triangle shape object darker than the sky with about 3 orange-reddish lights on the left and right side flying kind of fast on a straight line north to south; it block the view of
the stars when passing by. i saw it about one inch and a half the size of each side of the triangle. the lights where on the sides and none on the back. totally silent . i phone the tower at the airport to ask if they got something on the radar and the man tolde that no and i
could hear him typing in the keyboard and he sounded kind of nervous .
i wasn't surprise of seeing the object , i seem some before ; i. just regret that the sighting didn't last longer.
content.summary: Triangle with reddish lights flying overhead

content.detailedDescription: I was riding my bike home from the plaid pantry on eastman parkway and powell on the springwater trail and stopped at a bench.  the bench faces due south with walter's hill directly in view.  it was just barely dark, and i was looking at the stars and i noticed two star like objects slowly descending towards the horizon.  they were a white orange and moved in perfect sync with one another.  if you were to hold a pencil vertically at arms length with a light at each end, that's about how far they were from one another.  the detail that caught my attention was the fact that both lights moved perfectly with the other.  it was as if there was a long object with a light at both end.  i am also an avid sky watcher and i know where the stars and planets are.  these lights were moving rather slowly, and they were definitely out of place.  i first thought maybe they were planes or maybe satellites, but they didn't move or have the light characteristics of either.  i watched for a few minutes as both lights descended towards walter's hill.  the bottom light disappeared behind the hill.  before the second light went behind the hill, it suddenly dimmed and then went out.  i stayed on scene for another ten minutes or so, and nothing else happened.  this is significant for me, because about a year ago, i noticed a similar phenomenon.  two star like objects appeared in the same area of the sky but did not move.  they just glowed bright for a few minutes and then went out.  i have no idea what the lights i witnessed were, but i believe they were not airplanes, satellites, balloons, helicopters or any other manned craft i have seen.
content.summary: Two bright starlike objects slowly descending towards the horizon.

content.detailedDescription: Stayed night n alpine.Tx,@sisters. left @3:45a.M.,2 or 3 miles past marfa n the mountain,i notice a red blinking light thought it was a phone tower but way to high.  about 1 mile away getting closer my wife notice 2 more blinking lights 3 total,at that point i stop n the middle of the road got out ande began filming, then i notice a bright streak to the left of the lights hovering.The streak gave out a bright light that i thought showed a crome or grey body, shot straight across then started to shoot up then disappeared.I comment it on video then continued to film the 3 lights.After 2 minutes or so,i drove further down hgwy 90 until i was almost under it.I continue to capture these lights for about 5 to 10 minutes until the border patrol question us and force us to move on with an escort.
content.summary: Notices light above going west hgwy 90

content.detailedDescription: Large, glowing, and blinking.Not not moving.Looked out the window again it was not there.
content.summary: Large glowing, but far away.

content.detailedDescription: I was 16 years old in 1976. was parking on a gravel road with an old boyfriend listening to rock music. we had our music turned up really loud in those days when all of a sudden we heard a sound that got loud out of the clear blue. the sound drowned out the music that we were listening to. the noise just came out of no where. this area is out in the middle of nowhere. all of a sudden something sounded like it was hovering over the top of our car aprox 20 feet or so. my boyfriend leaned over and looked out of the driver side window. i also leaned over when he did and saw what looked like a big circular object. although i couldn't make out the color, there were lights all around the underneath. the thing seemed like it knew we were there. it stayed suspended over the car for a few seconds drowning out the music. we were so scared my boyfriend peeled out and away we went. it was definatly not a helicopter or anything of that sort. it was there, then all of a sudden just gone.  when i got home that night i rushed in and told my parents who didn't believe me. i think they thought i was trying to stay out past my curfew or something. i often wonder if there was a time difference that at the time i may not have noticed. just didn't here alot about things like that then. we didn't have the classic car not starting and this thing was loud not quiet.I kept this silent for many years until a few years ago. when i do tell people they just laugh and act like i am a kook or something. it has bothered me for many years and just wanted to get this off my chest.
content.summary: Saw from underneath. could not positively identify true shape. looked round or oval.

content.detailedDescription: I must have been about 13 at the time of this event, i am 29 at the moment yet the image in my head is still very clear but the exact date is hard to recall. one evening my sister, which is approximately 4 years older than myself, were in the back yard playing catch. i recall the sun had been setting when we first stepped out of the house and the air was cool with little humidity so it had to have been either spring or fall. just as we were getting ready to head in due to it becoming dark out, we heard the low rumble of what we thought was a commercial jet flying high in the sky, but when we turned to observe it, we noticed it was not a commercial aircraft; it was something we both had never seen before. the object was quite large. it was moving at what seemed to be a walking pace, like that of a jet in the distance but the object seemed to be flying very low, almost just above the treetops. this tells me that the aircraft was either flying low and slow and was about the size of a football field or it was flying very high and fast and was quite massive in scale. the aircraft was dark in color, probably black and had a round white light in each corner. the texture was not smooth, it appeared to have some sort of geometric patter stamped into it. i recall staring at it as it flew over us from our left heading west, we were facing south. it flew at a steady speed and we watched it until we it disappeared over the horizon. i remember being entranced, completely captivated by what was happening before my eyes. i also recall not thinking of anything, i was simply watching it, as if it were something familiar. we immediately turned to one another and said we should tell our parents so we did. we described it to my father and he sketched our description. i recently brought it up to my father and he thought we were "pulling their legs" and was shocked to hear that we were in fact telling the truth.
content.summary: Large black triangle with a single large round light in each corner flew west at a walking pace at what seemed to be just over the tree tops and sounded like a commercial jet that was flying at 20,000 ft.

content.detailedDescription: Bright red light like a star or a really bright light on an airplane.  it zig zagged twice really fast & then stopped.  then it faded out only to appear again seconds later inanother spot not far away.  it blinked whenever it was stationary in between zigzags.  it zigged 1 way & stopped then zagged back & stopped.  it kept this pattern staying under the clouds for about 15 minutes.  it then faded & i never saw it appear again.  it happened at exactly midnight to 12:15 am.
content.summary: Red light like a bright red star.  zigged 1 way then the other stopping in between. it then faded out slowly but tuened up a few seconds later in another spot. very fast except when stationary or fading. it kept under the clouds.

content.detailedDescription: I was out in the puna area near pahoa, big island of hawaii. it was january 26th when we headed out to view the lava flow (fire goddess pele)we made offerings to pele and meditated on the hot lava field for awhile. on out trek back, in the early morning of the 27th my friend pointed across the horizon of the sky to a saucer-type object that was hovering about above mauna loa. it did not move a whole lot but maybe from side to side and up and down in the radius of no more than 200-400 feet. it seemed as though whom-ever it was came to view the flow on the first full moon as well we were convinced. we watched it for 15 minutes or so, then continued on, we noticed it was still there in the same area about a half an house later as we walked on and forgot about it some. it was brightly lit, and definitely not acting as any known aircraft. it was not a plane. we felt a changed sense of consciousness and that we were being watched or observed, as if this craft was surveying the whole area. we did not feel in danger. it was a remarkable cap on an extraordinary night.
content.summary: First full moon, lava flowing- object was bright, hovered in one area. early a.M.

content.detailedDescription:
It was 1969, dark and i had just finished chores after dinner. i realized i had forgotten to take in my laundry from a third floor porch pulley line. i stepped out to take in my clothes and did not at first take notice, but upon reaching out for the line, i could see the sky clearly out of sink.

 i visualized the sky from the tops of trees that edged our property. i was shaken really thinking the russians had invaded. i ran in the house and checked my new baby boy and sat still for a minute or so wondering what i had just seen. i stepped back out for a peek to comfort myself having told myself i had experience northern lights. i am from maine and had seen norther lights and this was nothing like those at all.

i was so scared, i left my clothing on the line, went back into the house and locked the door. i turned the news on to see if something had taken place that may have been observed by others and reported. absolutely nothing was mentioned out of the ordinary. surely, had we had a display of northern lights it would have been mentioned in the media.

i did ask family and friends if they saw the lights and no one witnessed the display. i never drank or did drugs, i was not a nervous person, but this sure did confuse me. i was afraid to make any mention of it after that until viewing a documentary in 2013 about alien mysteries and the subject of the orange light that appeared to a man driving one evening during 1969.

though i never had an answer for what i had witnessed, the explanation of his sighting refreshed my memory and gave me closure just in knowing i was not alone experiencing this.  i have not had any such sightings since, but i would love to have it debunked!
content.summary: Not aurora,soft orange glow somewhat brighter at treetop horizon area

content.detailedDescription: Wife and myself on our way home at nearly dusk on may 5th 2013. as we entered the subdivision onto flintlock dr, we noticed an orb shaped object that looked as if it were made of fire. it was brightly lit orange in color. it traveled west to east across flintlock subdivision with a slight direction change just before it traveled out of our field of vision. its height im estimating less then 2000 ft, tho my wife thinks it was much lower, closer to tree level. im estimating the size near small helicopter size around 30 ft in diameter. no noticeable blinking, light fluctuation, or color change. for better mapping, roughly 1/2 mile north of hwy 316 traveling west from dacula toward athens.
content.summary: Orb shaped object, looked as made of fire. witnessed by me and my wife as it traveled approx one half mile north of hwy 316 traveling west to east then out of site.

content.detailedDescription:
Around mid afternoon i was sitting in my backyard with two other people when i noticed a cesna type aircraft overhead , while looking at the plane i noticed that at much higher elevation there were three round like objects which at first i thought were balloons ,one was red the other two were white and all were reflecting sunlight . 

the path of flight was heading south at first then the red one slowed down considerably and the two white ones continued on in close proximity to each other before one changed direction rather abruptly and accelerated west until i could no longer see it because of the sun ,while the other maintained its speed and continued southerly .I lost sight of the red one  while it was still pretty much overhead . there were no clouds and the strangest thing was the direction change and acceleration . another witness commented they must be drones of some sort.
content.summary: Three objects ,two white one red at high altitude . appeared to be controlled flight.

content.detailedDescription:
Walking out to my car after work. (parking lot at the waterview senior living center next to the hilton. there was a red light blinking in the sky and it caught my eye. i first thought the object was an airplane but it was quiet and it kept changing colors. the object was triangular/boomerang shape that seemed to have 3 distinct sides with a hollow center. it's motions were up and down and side to side (not necessarily in that order). it was very fast. i was perplexed as to what it was and became somewhat giddy with an adrenaline rush when i realized i could not identfy the object. i lost sight of the object when it just disappeared. one second it was moving erratically and changing colors, the next it was just gone. i got in my car and went home. 

*note* this detailed description was just spoken to me by my girlfriend karen. she is the one who witnessed the event and took the cell phone video. she shared it with me and i asked if i could share this with your site.
content.summary: Unidentified colorful object erratically flying in the sky. no sound was emittng from the object.

content.detailedDescription: At first i thought it was a meteorite but when observed with binoculars, object made a 180 and weaved around stars. very bright like shooting star but after turning became less intense and moved southeast over mount rainier. too fast for a satellite also manuvered.
content.summary: Appeared near star like metior but changed directions and weaved around stars.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were fast asleep in bed. our bed faces out two windows. we both felt like we were nudged awake at 12:45am and saw a huge flash of light, that made our entire bedroom light up as if it was daylight. at first, we thought it might be lightning, so we waited for the thunder. nothing happened. immediately, after the flash of light, all of the electronics in our house started to flicker and then immediately turn off. we were without power for about 10+ minutes before everything turned back on. some of our electronics, continued to malfunction after the fact. there was never any thunder and no other flashes were seen. we stayed up for about 2 more hours. our child, whose bedroom is on the opposite side of the house, also witnessed it.
content.summary: Bright flash of light before electronics failure
